docs.abstract: Intel Corp tightens its revenue forecast for third quarter, pushing it just below midpoint of range of $6.3 billion to $6.9 billion it gave in July; revision means revenue will be largely in line with analysts' current expectations (S)
docs.snippet: The Intel Corporation tightened its revenue forecast for the third quarter today, pushing it just below the midpoint of the range of $6.3 billion to $6.9 billion it gave in July.     The revision means revenue will be largely in line with analysts...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Intel Corporation tightened its revenue forecast for the third quarter today, pushing it just below the midpoint of the range of $6.3 billion to $6.9 billion it gave in July. The revision means revenue will be largely in line with analysts' current expectations.

headline.main: Intel Now Says Revenue Will Be Slightly Lower

docs.abstract: Warren E Buffett makes his first move into technology sector as he and money managers Longleaf Partners Funds and Legg Mason buy $500 million of bonds issued by Level 3 Communications, money-losing fiber optic cable company; deal is watershed for Buffett, who has avoided technology and communications investments despite occasional pleas from shareholders of his company Berkshire Hathaway; shares of Level 3 jump 51 percent, rising $1.47, to $4.36; photo (M)
docs.snippet: Warren E. Buffett made his first move into the technology sector yesterday as he and two other investors bought $500 million of bonds issued by Level 3 Communications, the money-losing fiber optic cable company.    The deal is a watershed for Mr. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett made his first move into the technology sector yesterday as he and two other investors bought $500 million of bonds issued by Level 3 Communications, the money-losing fiber optic cable company. The deal is a watershed for Mr. Buffett, one of the most influential investors, who has avoided technology and communications investments -- even when they were hot -- despite occasional pleas from shareholders of his company, Berkshire Hathaway.

headline.main: Buffett in Move Into Technology Sector

docs.abstract: Exciteathome's shares fall 11 percent after Promethean Investment Group, which arranged emergency financing for company in spring, demands $50 million payment (S)
docs.snippet: The troubles at Excite@Home worsened today after an investment firm that arranged emergency financing for the company last spring demanded a $50 million payment by the end of the week.    The news pushed shares of Excite @Home down 11 cents, to 39...
docs.lead_paragraph: The troubles at Excite@Home worsened today after an investment firm that arranged emergency financing for the company last spring demanded a $50 million payment by the end of the week. The news pushed shares of Excite @Home down 11 cents, to 39 cents.
